ComicInfo.Title: The Butterfly Field; Something is Killing The Children; A Monster Hunter Walks Into a Bar, Part Three; Shutter; I Can't Take You Anywhere; The Search; The War, Part Five
ComicInfo.Summary:
The fresh face of modern horror continues with more terror from the industry's best!
In "The War, Part 5," by Garth Ennis and Becky Cloonan, David and Nikki take refuge, but quickly learn that there's more to survival than isolation from the outside world.
Meanwhile, Erica Slaughter's investigation continues in a new Something is Killing the Children adventure, plus hilarious horror from Robert Hack (Elvira Meets H.P. Lovecraft), and much more!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-03 07:07:01. [CVDB1080125]
ComicInfo.Writer: Garth Ennis, James Tynion IV, Jeremy Bastian, Robert Hack, Sarah Andersen, Sarah Gailey
ComicInfo.Penciller: Becky Cloonan, Liana Kangas, Robert Hack, Sarah Andersen, Werther Dell'Edera, Ziyan Qiu
ComicInfo.Inker: Becky Cloonan, Liana Kangas, Robert Hack, Sarah Andersen, Werther Dell'Edera, Ziyan Qiu
ComicInfo.Colorist: James Fenner, Miquel Muerto, Rebecca Nalty, Robert Hack, Sarah Andersen, Tamra Bonvillain
ComicInfo.Letterer: AndWorld Design, Jodie Troutman, Pat Brosseau, Robert Hack, Sarah Andersen
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Jenny Frison, Martin Simmonds, Paolo Manuel Rivera
